In view of the fall of Mussolini, the Secretary ojc StateforForeign Affairs referred to his Memorandum (W.P. He suggested that the time had now come to consult our"Allies on this matter.The War Cabinet-(1) Authorised the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs to approach the Allied Governments, and to invite themto participate in a declaration in the terms of the draft annexed to his Memorandum (W.P.
